metadata.name: Freedom / UA Sovereignty 1/1000
metadata.description:
All proceeds routed to ndao.eth
Donate directly here: https://app.endaoment.org/ukraine 

Clocks ticking violently as each seemingly endless second passes by, 
In the dark of night, stripped of conscious thinking, 
Where an hour feels like a second, 
When a minute feels like a long dream, 
Awakened only by the surreal rumbling of iron and steel, 
A new reality born from the ashes of delirium.
